name: City of Heroes
content:
files:
- setup: http://patch.savecoh.com/tequila.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/Games/CoH/tequila.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing Corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: wmi
    description: Installing Windows Management Interface
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: false
- task:
    description: Simulating Windows reboot.
    executable: wineboot
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Tequila
    executable: tequila
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/CoH"
system:
  env:
    PBA_ENABLE: 1
wine:
  esync: true
  version: esync-staging-pba-3.16-x86_64
